definitions.definition: A tiny piece of bread, either one that falls from bread as it is cut or eaten, or one made deliberately by crumbling bread.
A single link in a chain indicating the hierarchical location of a directory , web page or similar, used as a navigation aid .
definitions.label_groups: graphical user interface , chiefly in the plural

definitions.definition: A fragment of data that serves to log the actions taken by a program, used in debugging.
One in a series of clues leading to a person or place.

main_definition: ( chiefly in the plural ) A tiny piece of bread, either one that falls from bread as it is cut or eaten, or one made deliberately by crumbling bread.
secondary_definitions: ( graphical user interface , chiefly in the plural ) A single link in a chain indicating the hierarchical location of a directory , web page or similar, used as a navigation aid .
( programming , chiefly in the plural ) A fragment of data that serves to log the actions taken by a program, used in debugging.
( figuratively , in the plural ) One in a series of clues leading to a person or place.
